workflow.name: Generate eCommerce product descriptions with GPT-4o-mini and Airtable
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate your eCommerce content workflow by generating AI-optimized product descriptions directly from Airtable. üõçÔ∏èü§ñ This automation checks for pending products every 15 minutes, processes them in batches, and uses GPT-4o-mini to create structured long descriptions, short answer blocks, bullet features, and feature tables. All AI-generated fields are then written back into the same Airtable record, ensuring clean, consistent, and SEO-friendly product copy. Perfect for stores looking to scale product listings without manual writing. ‚ú®üìÑ

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Triggers every 15 minutes to look for products marked as ‚Äúpending‚Äù. ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Fetches product data from Airtable for processing. üì¶
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Splits results into batches to avoid API rate limits. üîÅ
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Sends product attributes to GPT-4o-mini for AI-generated content. ü§ñ
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Uses a structured JSON parser to ensure clean, valid AI output. üìê
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Converts the AI JSON into Airtable-friendly fields using a Code node. üß©
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Updates the original Airtable product record with generated descriptions. ‚úçÔ∏è
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Marks each item as ‚Äúdone‚Äù with a timestamp. ‚úîÔ∏è

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Creates consistent, high-quality product descriptions automatically
 ‚úÖ Produces AI-friendly content for search engines & answer engines
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual copywriting for large product catalogs
 ‚úÖ Ensures structured, valid, and predictable output every time
 ‚úÖ Runs reliably on schedule with zero human oversight
 ‚úÖ Ideal for eCommerce teams scaling product listings

## üß© Features
- Scheduled automation (every 15 minutes)
- Airtable integration for fetching & updating records
- Batch processing to prevent rate-limit issues
- GPT-4o-mini AI content generation
- Structured output parser for clean JSON
- Code node formatting for Airtable
- Automatic status + timestamp updating

## üîê Requirements
- Airtable Personal Access Token
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini)
- Airtable base + table with required fields
- n8n with LangChain nodes enabled

## üéØ Target Audience
- eCommerce teams managing product catalogs
- Marketplace sellers needing scalable content
- Operations teams automating product listings
- Agencies generating optimized product copy for clients

workflow.name: Generate AI-friendly product descriptions from Airtable to Airtable

parameters.content:
## AI-Friendly Product Description Generator ‚Äì Overview

This workflow creates high-quality, structured product descriptions using AI. It checks Airtable every 15 minutes for products marked as pending, generates long descriptions, short answer blocks, bullet features, and feature table content, and updates the same Airtable record. This helps eCommerce teams maintain consistent, SEO-friendly product copy with minimal effort.

### How it works
1. A schedule trigger runs every 15 minutes.
2. Airtable returns products with status = ‚Äúpending‚Äù.
3. Products are processed in small batches.
4. GPT-4o-mini generates structured JSON content for each product.
5. A structured output parser ensures clean, valid JSON.
6. A Code node converts AI output into Airtable-safe fields.
7. Airtable is updated with the generated descriptions and marked ‚Äúdone‚Äù.

### Setup steps
- Add Airtable credentials and connect to your Product table.
- Add OpenAI credentials.
- Confirm Airtable fields match:  
  `ai_long_description`,  
  `ai_short_answer_block`,  
  `ai_bullet_features`,  
  `ai_feature_table_json`,  
  `status`,  
  `ai_last_run_at`.
- Run a test execution to verify results.

### Customization
Adjust frequency, tone, prompt style, or field mappings as needed.

## Trigger & Fetch Products
Runs every 15 minutes and pulls pending product records from Airtable.

## Batch Processing
Splits products into batches to avoid API rate limits.

## AI Content Generation
Generates product descriptions and structured content using GPT-4o-mini.

## Format AI Output
Converts structured JSON into clean Airtable fields.

## Update Airtable
Updates product records with AI output and marks them as completed.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
